package.name: VarSetUpdate
package.description: `VarSetUpdate` is a FreeCAD macro designed to streamline the process of updating variable names and properties in VarSet objects. Originally authored by **Mathias L.** and extended by **[DesignWeaver](https://forum.freecad.org/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=80381&sid=658045436126114983df20117ee27bf5) (NSUBB)**, this utility provides a robust toolset for managing properties, ensuring compatibility with existing relationships, and simplifying modifications.
